column5: First off I would like to thank everyone on my last post about this topic.Youve been a great help.My sony camcorder a/v out port doubles as an in port.I didnt know.Searching all this time for an aquaview recorder,havent come across any even on aquaviews site.But anyway it is possibe to go from the view to the cam.But  one has said and so did the rep at ehr,sony at times changes their A/V ports on the camcorder.Thanks everyone for your input,cheers and good fishing.Vince.

I seem to have trouble following your posts/questions and I seem get what you are asking wrong but there is a recorder here it is I have one myself    http://www.sportsmansguide.com/net/cb/natu...u.aspx?a=530948
